oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Top row (left to right): Pro. B.W. Cole (teacher), Emma Epperson (Mrs. W.C. Taylor), Mary Beasley, Jennie B. Burton (Mrs. Don Merritt), Jim Taylor, Babe Lawrence, Lee Hudson, and Joe Taylor. Second row: Gran Williams, Guff Lorance, Dick Hudson, ??illian Burton, and Lela Beasley
